name: 高等分析化學（二）
description: The objective of this course aims at enhancing the knowledge of analytical techniques and broadening the view of real-world analytical chemistry for the students.The goal of this course is to train students to be able to deeply involved into the technical and managerial aspects of running an chemical analytical laboratory or company with satisfactory performance that meets the international standards.
goals: The objective of this course aims at enhancing the knowledge of analytical techniques and broadening the view of real-world analytical chemistry for the students.The goal of this course is to train students to be able to deeply involved into the technical and managerial aspects of running an chemical analytical laboratory or company with satisfactory performance that meets the international standards.

The goal of this course is to train students to be able to deeply involved into the technical and managerial aspects of running an chemical analytical laboratory or company with satisfactory performance that meets the international standards.
syllabus: This course intends to cover principle of analytical techniques and instruments, which were not taught sufficiently in the course of Instrumental Analysis, basic sample pretreatment techniques, management strategy of analytical laboratory and some specific cases of analytical work. The quality control techniques and quality assurance programs for a good analytical laboratory will be discussed in details.
